mapper.insert: insert into codeworld_order_return ( t_return_order_id, t_order_id, t_return_order_status, t_return_order_apply_time, t_return_order_type, t_return_order_reason ) values ( #{orderReturnId}, #{orderId}, #{orderReturnStatus}, #{orderReturnApplyTime}, #{orderReturnType}, #{orderReturnReason} )
mapper.select: select cor.t_return_order_id AS orderReturnId, cor.t_order_id AS orderId, cor.t_return_order_status AS orderReturnStatus, cor.t_return_handle_time AS orderReturnHandleTime, cor.t_return_order_reason AS orderReturnReason, cor.t_return_order_apply_time AS orderReturnApplyTime, cor.t_return_order_type AS orderReturnType, co.t_order_total_pay AS totalPay, co.t_order_actual_pay AS actualPay, co.t_order_address_id AS addressId, co.t_order_buyer_name AS buyerName, co.t_order_create_time AS createTime from codeworld_order_return AS cor left join codeworld_order_detail AS cod on cor.t_order_id = cod.t_order_detail_id left join codeworld_order AS co on cod.t_order_id = co.t_order_id where cod.t_merchant_number = #{merchantNumber} order by cor.t_return_order_apply_time
